modName: Dwarven Sphere Follower -R2-3PO- and House Mod
summary: This mod adds a simple dwemer house (one room) known as the Dwemer Broom Closet to Markarth. The main point of the mod is the Dwarven Sphere Follower which resides inside the broom closet, among other things.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a simple dwemer house (one room) known as the Dwemer Broom Closet to Markarth. Its on the second floor near Nepos House. The main point of the mod is the Dwarven Sphere Follower which resides inside the broom closet, among other things.

Features:
-Custom dialogue Dwarven Sphere follower named R2-3PO or \"Artoo\" (Star Wars reference perhaps)
-Simple Dwemer house with all the normal amenities
-Artoo retracts into ball form when not in combat
-Rolls around like a boss 

Two versions:
One that regenerates health in combat and another version that does not.

Install:
Drop into data folder shouldn\'t have any overwrites. Or use the NMM


Please endorse and enjoy!

-MercyXx
author: MercyXx
